name: steam-headless
tagline: A headless Steam client for servers and containers
description: docker-steam-headless provides a self-hosted, headless Steam client in Docker for remote game downloads or streaming setups. It exposes web-based management for sessions.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Runs Steam client in Docker without physical display

features.title: Remote Access
features.description: Connects to Steam via web browser or VNC

features.title: Game Downloads
features.description: Downloads and manages Steam games on server

features.title: Streaming Support
features.description: Streams games to other devices via Steam Link or Moonlight

features.title: Proton Compatibility
features.description: Runs Windows games on Linux with Proton integration

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Backs up and syncs game saves across devices

features.title: Workshop Support
features.description: Downloads and manages Steam Workshop content

features.title: Controller Support
features.description: Passes through USB controllers for game input
